article_metadata.author: Alejandro Chafuen

og.description: What will the economy be like in 2015? There is increased optimism about the U.S. economy. Yet challenges abound, both coming from the inside and from abroad.
og.title: The U.S. Economy In 2015: Challenges And Opportunities
